title: [Neuroscience] Psychedelics temporarily disrupt the functional organization of the brain, resulting in increased “perceptual bandwidth,” finds a new study of the neurobiological mechanisms underlying psychedelic-induced entropy

[Medicine] Tea has reported therapeutic properties against high blood pressure. A 1% green tea extract augmented KCNQ5 activity >20-fold, which contributed to blood vessel dilation; similar effects of black tea were inhibited by milk. Green tea extracts are candidates for future anti-hypertensive drugs.
